name: 2D Platformer Complete
description:
Modifications:

1. Completed an entirely new level 3 with a significant amount of parkour elements, moving platforms, and enemy jumps.

2. Completely reskinned an entire level to be candy themed. Created 2 different background sprites including a pink brick and sprinkle tile. 2 different foreground sprites, a cake, and a cookie brick.  Animated a Chocolate acid tile. Created background detail candy cane sprite.  Replaced idle sprites of enemies to look like different colored nerds. 

3. Added custom music using GarageBand to the background of level 2. 

Created by Benjamin Eyke.
